hero-section.welcome-message: Welcome to dataviz: small collection of charts designed to compare various data from all over the world.
hero-section.description: Every chart on this website was created using D3.js, a popular JavaScript library for producing dynamic, interactive data visualizations in web browsers.
hero-section.quote: The greatest value of a picture is when it forces us to notice what we never expected to see.

about.title: About

goals.subheader: This website is a pet project created with the following goals in mind:

learn-d3.title: Learn to manipulate SVG with D3.js
learn-d3.description: There are many libraries that allow you to create SVG charts, but D3 is the most famous of them. D3 can give more control over the visualizations you plan to create, has a large community and infrastructure.

combine-d3-and-jsx.title: Learn to combine D3.js with JSX
combine-d3-and-jsx.description: For some reason, most of the D3 tutorials and examples use the imperative chaining syntax. But nowadays web developers gravitate towards using a declarative approach (React, Vue). It turns out you can use D3 declaratively as well. Therefore, one of the goals of creating the project was to learn how to combine two wonderful tools.

youtube-channels.title: Most Popular YouTube Channels
youtube-channels.teaser: Top 50 largest channels by the number of subscribers. Comparison by language, country and content category.
youtube-channels.image-alt: Drawing of a girl looking at her tablet
youtube-channels.introduction: In this article, we take a look at the top 50 YouTube channels by subscriber count as of August 19, 2022.
youtube-channels.about-source: All information about the channels was taken from the Wikipedia article: "List of the most popular YouTube channels".

top-ten-channels.subheader: Top 10 channels by amount of subscribers
top-ten-channels.caption: top 10 channels
top-ten-channels.first-paragraph: As we can see, the Indian music channel T-series confidently holds the first place. The number of T-series subscribers is more than 1.5 times the number of subscribers of the nearest pursuer.
top-ten-channels.second-paragraph: Interestingly, although there are representatives of 5 countries in the top ten, there are only two broadcast languages: English and Hindi.

languages.caption: percentage of languages among the top 50 channels
languages.first-paragraph: If the information provided by the source is correct, only six languages are used among the top 50 channels. The chart above shows the ratio of these languages sorted by number of channels or percentage of subscribers.
languages.second-paragraph: English is the most popular language among the channels with the most subscribers, with 22 channels and 45% of subscribers speaking it. Next comes Hindi with 15 channels and 33% of subscribers. These two languages make up over 70 percent of the top 50.
languages.third-paragraph: The biggest surprise for me was Bhojpuri, which I didn't even know existed. It is considered to be a dialect of Hindi, but have a status of recognized national language. So, two of the six languages present came from India - impressive!

content-categories.caption: content categories featured in the top 50 channels
content-categories.first-paragraph: The top 50 includes 9 content categories. The rating is dominated by music channels: 23 channels represent this category. "Entertainment" is in second place with twelve channels.
content-categories.second-paragraph: The list continues with "Education", which has 4, and "Film" (3). "Games" and "Sports" each have two channels, while "How-to", "News", and "Comedy" only have one each.

countries.caption: world map showing distribution of channels from the top 50
countries.first-paragraph: India is the country with the most channels in the top 50. In second place is the USA. Apart from these two, the channels are fairly evenly distributed among the countries that made it to the top - each country has one or two channels. But in fact, most countries do not have channels that represent them.

james-bond-films.title: James Bond Films
james-bond-films.teaser: Comparison of all films about Agent 007 by budget spent and box office. Let's take a look at the most popular actor, director and most successful film.
james-bond-films.introduction: James Bond is a classic franchise that currently has 27 films. The first film was made in the 1960s, and the last, at the time of writing, in 2021. During this time, the main cast and crew changed several times. In this article, we will compare the financial success of these films and see how the key people involved in the production (actor and director) impacted the box office.
james-bond-films.about-source: All information about the films was taken from the Wikipedia article: "List of James Bond films".
